Sentencas: Ammonia is a useful energy carrier for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with advantages over hydrogen.
Titulo: A pressurized ammonia-fed planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell at 1-5 atm and 750-850 °C and its loaded short stability test

Sentencas: Understanding of the performance and stability of ammonia-fed SOFC operated at elevated pressure (p) is an important step towards the development of high-efficiency hybrid SOFC power system with micro gas turbine (MGT).
Titulo: A pressurized ammonia-fed planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell at 1-5 atm and 750-850 °C and its loaded short stability test

Sentencas: This paper reports cell performance, electrochemical impedance spectra (EIS), and stability measurements of a pressurized ammonia-fed anode-supported SOFC at p = 1-5 atm and T = 750-850 degrees C using a planar (50 x 50 mm(2)) single-full-cell (400 mm Ni-YSZ anode/3 mu m YSZ electrolyte/12
Titulo: A pressurized ammonia-fed planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell at 1-5 atm and 750-850 °C and its loaded short stability test
A pressurized ammonia-fed planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell at 1-5 atm and 750-850 °C and its loaded short stability test

Sentencas: The full cell together with metallic frames and current collectors are sandwiched by a pair of rib-channel flow distributors (interconnectors) in a high-pressure testing facility.
Titulo: A pressurized ammonia-fed planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell at 1-5 atm and 750-850 °C and its loaded short stability test

Sentencas: Results show that pressurization and increasing temperature enhance the ammonia-fed SOFC performance significantly having almost the same power densities as those of hydrogen/nitrogen-fed SOFC, as substantiated and explained by EIS data and an equivalence circuit model where the effects of p and T on ohmic, gas diffusion, and gas conversion impedances are shown.
Titulo: A pressurized ammonia-fed planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell at 1-5 atm and 750-850 °C and its loaded short stability test

Sentencas: Moreover, the loaded short (10 h) stability tests at 700 degrees C and 0.8 V for 1 atm/3 atm cases reveal no/little power degradation, where the microstructures without any crack within the scale of SEM observation and nearly the same element atomic percentages of Ni-YSZ anode surfaces from EDX spectra are found.
Titulo: A pressurized ammonia-fed planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell at 1-5 atm and 750-850 °C and its loaded short stability test

Sentencas: These results suggest that the pressurized ammonia-fed SOFC is a promising candidate for the hybrid SOFC-MGT power generation.
Titulo: A pressurized ammonia-fed planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell at 1-5 atm and 750-850 °C and its loaded short stability test
